attributes.action: Stop Ministers and others from attempting to Metricate the United Kingdom by stealth.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more often Ministers and others within the Government and on Television news, reports and many other interests are referring to measurements in the Metric System.  We are still an Imperial measuring country, together with our traditional means of measurements. These moves are a Government ploy for the acceptance of The EU and are designed to make the intergration into The EU more acceptable.
